post.summary: Lists sequences belonging to a given namespace

namespace.title: The namespace of the sequence (e.g., partner id, business id, Yesware account id)

sequenceId.title: The ID of the sequence that will be used as a "recipe" to construct the automation

type.title: The type of sequence (e.g., sales, marketing)

namespace.title: The namespace of the sequence (e.g., partner id, business id, Yesware account id)

displayName.title: The display name of the sequence

namespace.title: The namespace of the parent sequence

sequenceId.title: The ID of the parent sequence

orderedStepList.title: The list of steps to create for the given sequence

orderedStepIdList.title: The list of step IDs created

v1ListSequencesResponse.title: Response from getting a list of sequences

stepTypeList.title: The list of step types available for the given sequence type

displayName.title: The display name for the step

delaySeconds.title: The delay in seconds before the step is executed

taskDefinitionId.title: The Task ID from the Automation Task, signifies the step type

taskInputData.title: Input data is freeform json of the data passed into the task

v1StepInput.title: Input needed to create a single step

paths.description: The set of field mask paths.

vendastatypesFieldMask.title: `FieldMask` represents a set of symbolic field paths, for example:
